## Software inventory

### Amplitude analysis projects

The following frameworks or projects are specifically designed to do amplitude analysis. The table is built from [this YAML file](./software/amplitude-analysis-projects.yml) and can be updated [here](https://github.com/ComPWA/edit/main/docs/software/amplitude-analysis-projects.yml).

```{python}
import os

if "EXECUTE_NB" in os.environ:
    from IPython.display import HTML, display

    from pwa_pages.project_inventory import (
        ProjectInventory,
        fix_html_alignment,
        load_yaml,
        to_html_table,
    )

    inventory_dict = load_yaml("amplitude-analysis-projects.yml")
    html_src = to_html_table(
        inventory=ProjectInventory(**inventory_dict),
        selected_languages=[
            "C++",
            "Python",
            "Julia",
            "Cuda",
        ],
        fetch=True,
    )
    html_src = fix_html_alignment(html_src)
    display(HTML(html_src))
```

### General fitter packages

The following packages do not have functionality for amplitude building, but can do fits with high performance. The YAML database for this table can be updated [here](https://github.com/ComPWA/edit/main/docs/software/fitter-packages.yml).

```{python}
if "EXECUTE_NB" in os.environ:
    inventory_dict = load_yaml("software/fitter-packages.yml")
    html_src = to_html_table(
        inventory=ProjectInventory(**inventory_dict),
        selected_languages=[
            "C++",
            "Python",
            "Cuda",
        ],
        fetch=True,
        hide_columns=["Collaboration"],
    )
    html_src = fix_html_alignment(html_src)
    display(HTML(html_src))
```
